name: ziko-wrapper
description: ```jsx    <ZikoUI ui={ZikoUIElement} />   ``` ## Vue   ```html    <script setup>    import {text} from "ziko";    const ui = text("hello").style({     color:"green"     }).render(false).onClick(()=>txt.value = " From Zikojs"); </script> <template>   <ZikoUI :ui="ui"/> </template>
